title: Legendary Whitetails Men's Buck Camp Flannel, Long Sleeve Plaid Button Down Casual Shirt, Corduroy Cuffs
descriptions:
Introducing the Legendary Whitetails Men's Buck Camp Flannel, the perfect addition to your wardrobe for both indoor and outdoor wear. This long sleeve plaid button-down casual shirt is designed with comfort and style in mind.

Crafted from 100% cotton, this flannel shirt offers a soft brushed fabric that is both durable and fade-resistant. With a weight of 5.1 ounces, it provides a lightweight feel that is suitable for layering or wearing on its own.

The relaxed fit of this shirt ensures ease of movement without pulling or tugging, making it ideal for any activity. The double-pleated back design adds a touch of sophistication and enhances the durability of the shirt. 

Featuring a corduroy lined collar and cuffs, this shirt offers both style and functionality. The corduroy lining enhances the durability of the shirt, while the collar and cuffs add a classic touch to the overall design.

With a classic single pocket design and a convenient pencil slot, this shirt offers storage options for your essentials. Whether it's holding your pen or safeguarding your sunglasses, this shirt has got you covered.

The care instructions provided ensure optimal shrinkage management, allowing you to maintain the perfect fit. The pill-resistant fabric ensures lasting quality and the fade-resistant design keeps your shirt looking sharp.

The Legendary Whitetails Men's Buck Camp Flannel is imported and is true to the images provided. It offers immediate out-of-the-box comfort with no break-in period required.

Ideal for layering or standalone wear, this shirt is suitable for both indoor and outdoor use. Its sharp look and lasting comfort make it a versatile choice for any occasion.

Upgrade your wardrobe with the Legendary Whitetails Men's Buck Camp Flannel and experience the perfect blend of style, comfort, and durability.
